update CMS_INFO
SITE_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TITLE_COLOR = #{titleColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CMS_INFO set SITE_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOR_TTITLE = #{shorTtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_COLOR = #{titleColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_BLOD = #{titleBlod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAGS = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTCHS = #{attchs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEMPLET_ID = #{templetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOP_END_TIME = #{topEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLICK_NUM = #{clickNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADD_USER = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SIGN = #{isSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_COMMENT = #{isComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_TIME_TYPE = #{openTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_END_TIME = #{openEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPEN_TYPE = #{openType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTML_INDEX_NUM = #{htmlIndexNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_IMGS = #{isImgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_STATE = #{auditState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = VERSION+1, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, REGIONS_CODE = #{regionsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CMS_INFO set SITE_ID = #{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOR_TTITLE = #{shorTtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_COLOR = #{titleColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE_BLOD = #{titleBlod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TAGS = #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTCHS = #{attchs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADD_TIME = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TEMPLET_ID = #{templetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_HOT = #{isHot,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOP_END_TIME = #{topEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLICK_NUM = #{clickNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADD_USER = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_SIGN = #{isSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIDEO = #{video,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_COMMENT = #{isComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_TIME_TYPE = #{openTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_END_TIME = #{openEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPEN_TYPE = #{openType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HTML_INDEX_NUM = #{htmlIndexNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_IMGS = #{isImgs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDIT_STATE = #{auditState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VERSION = VERSION+1, IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, REGIONS_CODE = #{regionsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
update CMS_INFO
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VERSION = VERSION+1, IS_DELETED='Y',
WHERE ID=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (IS_DELETED='N' OR T.IS_DELETED!='R')
mapper.select:
SELECT TT.* FROM (
SELECT t.id, t.title, t.html_index_num, cc.page_mark CHANNEL_PAGE_MARK,T.IS_TOP,T.ADD_TIME FROM cms_info t JOIN cms_channel cc ON cc.id = t.channel_id AND cc.is_deleted = 'N' WHERE T.IS_DELETED = 'N'
AND CC.PAGE_MARK = #{paramMap.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND T.REGIONS_CODE = #{paramMap.regionsCode,jdbcType=CHAR}
AND T.STATE = '01' AND CC.PAGE_MARK IN ('dynamic','inform')
AND ( T.TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{paramMap.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') OR
INSTR(T.CONTENT,#{paramMap.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >0 )
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT a.id,a.course_code title,NULL html_index_num,'course' CHANNEL_PAGE_MARK,NULL IS_TOP,a.create_time ADD_TIME FROM ipr_course a LEFT JOIN ipr_train_course itc ON a.id = itc.course_id AND itc.is_deleted = 'N' LEFT JOIN ipr_train it ON itc.train_id = it.id AND it.is_deleted = 'N' LEFT JOIN ipbox_project ip ON ip.id = it.project_id AND ip.status = '02' AND ip.is_deleted = 'N' WHERE a.is_deleted = 'N' AND a.status = '02'
AND A.course_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramMap.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND (it.end_time > NOW() OR it.id IS NULL)
) TT ORDER BY TT.IS_TOP DESC,TT.ADD_TIME DESC
